results.content: He spends a lot of time explaining how copy and paste works. Also looks to be using a version of windows that most younger users probably wont even remember.

results.content:
Very clear, concise and easy to understand course.  Actually get the concepts behind Less now. 

Will be implementing this in my design work as the lecturer shows how it can speed up workflow, and simplify  complex, incomprehensible CSS.  Recommended
results.content_html:
Very clear, concise and easy to understand course. Actually get the concepts behind Less now.

Will be implementing this in my design work as the lecturer shows how it can speed up workflow, and simplify complex, incomprehensible CSS. Recommended

results.content: The videos were good quality, and easy to understand.  I was a little confused as to the working files, as I opened the ones that I thought aligned with the videos that I was watching and they seemed to already be completed.  Anyway, aside from that it was a good introduction to LESS.  I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a clear explanation on the benefits and use of LESS as a tool for web design/development.
results.content_html: The videos were good quality, and easy to understand. I was a little confused as to the working files, as I opened the ones that I thought aligned with the videos that I was watching and they seemed to already be completed. Anyway, aside from that it was a good introduction to LESS. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a clear explanation on the benefits and use of LESS as a tool for web design/development.

results.content: Ok, considering all the other information and content you can get here on udemy, this course is worth under $10. Half of the information on this course are so basic that someone looking to learn LESS should already know the basics on how to create a folder and install Firebug...
results.content_html: Ok, considering all the other information and content you can get here on udemy, this course is worth under $10. Half of the information on this course are so basic that someone looking to learn LESS should already know the basics on how to create a folder and install Firebug...

results.content_html:
Good course;
easy to understand and i really learned,
Thanks

results.content:
just recently i've noticed how large my CSS files were becoming as i tried to work in styling for various media outputs etc _ this course has given me a large helping hand to rectifying that increasingly cumbersome problem _
many thanks to Infinite Skills for pointing out this course existed and to the people at {LESS} for creating it (and the language itself) _ a REAL bonus to hard-working web-developers _ i have no hesitation in 'Highly Recommending' this course to everyone involved in creating Cascading Style Sheets _ (and thanks again!)
